backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, trade journal types, and CRUD for custom columns and trades with authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Minimal migration module returning state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking new frontend column features to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s responsibilities and recent additions including new date fields.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component toggling between the calculations table and supplier report views.
frontend/src/components/business/Busines: Main editable table component handling create, edit, delete, validation, custom columns, and new SOR/Order date fields.
frontend/src/components/business/DeleteR: Confirmation dialog for deleting a record with shadcn UI components.
frontend/src/components/business/Editabl: Reusable editable cell supporting text, number, date, and select inputs with validation.
frontend/src/components/business/ManageC: Dialog for adding, renaming, reordering, and deleting custom columns using React Query mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks for business records and custom columns using mock data and localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind styles, color variables, dark mode, and print-specific formatting rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessCalculationsT: Displays and manages business records with create, update, delete, and column management UI.
frontend/src/pages/SupplierWiseReportPag: Generates a supplier‑grouped report with subtotals, CSV export, and print support.
frontend/src/types/businessRecord.ts: Defines BusinessRecord and CustomColumn types plus status constants.
frontend/src/utils/calculations.ts: Provides utility functions for amount calculations and currency formatting.
frontend/src/utils/exportSupplierReportC: Generates a supplier report CSV by compiling grouped records, subtotals, and a grand total, then triggers a file download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and manage hash-based parameters.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Implements simple number validation and safe number parsing for form inputs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, features, issues, and design goals for a business calculation web app.
